features.id: The ListReader will detect inconsistent types in the provided data.

blocks.text: We have a nested list whose structure resembles a matrix!
We use the reader to internally fill 2 lists representing shape and data...
However this leads to an exception because of type incoherence!
code: exception.message == "Type inconsistency encountered. Not all leave elements are of the same type!\n" +

features.id: The ListReader will detect inconsistent degrees of nesting in the provided data.

blocks.text: We have a nested list whose structure resembles a matrix!
We use the reader to internally fill 2 lists representing shape and data...

code: exception.message == "Size inconsistency encountered at nest level '0'. Not all nested lists are equally sized.\n" +
